definition: lit. to point at the chicken while scolding the dog (idiom)/fig. to make indirect criticisms
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

female chicken crows at daybreak (idiom); a woman usurps authority/women meddle in politics/The female wears the trousers.

small-minded

to look for trouble
